sentences.en: Both are equally remote and vacuous.
sentences.cn: 二者都同样是遥远和空虚的.

sentences.en: Happiness purifies our soul, and pales those who are materialistically prosperous yet spiritually vacuous.
sentences.cn: 幸福净化灵魂, 并让那些在物质上富足,然精神却很空洞的人黯然失色.

sentences.en: He has swapped talk of plain " rupture " for the vacuous " tranquil rupture ".
sentences.cn: 他将空洞无物的“平静决裂”替换为清晰明了的 “ 决裂 ”.

sentences.en: His eyes looked dull, almost vacuous.
sentences.cn: 他看上去目光呆滞, 茫然若失.

sentences.en: In return, he offered cuts in industrial tariffs that were, if anything, even more vacuous.
sentences.cn: 作为回报, 他就工业关税减免, 如果有区别, 那就是更加空洞.

sentences.en: Male models are not always so vacuous as they are made out to be.
sentences.cn: 男模特儿并不总像人们说的那样愚蠢。

sentences.en: We would be satisfied with any draft document, however vacuous.
sentences.cn: 我们对任何草案都会感到满意, 即使草案的内容非常空洞也无所谓.

words.tran_cn: 直愣愣地，没有表情地；空虚地，空地
空虚；空白；思想贫乏；无聊之事
[真空]空的；空虚的；空洞的；无意义的

trans.tran_cn: 空虚的，愚蠢的，茫然若失的，无聊的
trans.tran_en: showing no intelligence or having no useful purpose
